Title: POWELL RAISE
Directions: This is a shoulder abduction strengthening exercise that is used to target the deltoids. Start by setting up a bench to a roughly 30-45 degree incline. Lie on the bench on your side with the target shoulder being on the top side. Hold a dumbbell and raise the weight from the side of your body until roughly 90 degrees shoulder abduction. Lower the weight back down towards the floor in front of you.
